## Poison simulation

- simulate $y_i \sim poison(\lamda)$
- simulate $x_i \binomial(y_i,p)$

```{python}
lamda = 2
size = 100
y = np.random.poisson(lamda, size=size)
x = np.random.binomial(y, p=.4, size=size)
x

```
